>
[Brilliant Crafter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3114) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 49</row>

**Archetype** [Inventor](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=108)

**Prerequisites**
[Inventor Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3112)

</column>

---

Your skill at crafting is unparalleled. You become an expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4). At 7th level you become a master in Crafting, and at 15th level, you become legendary in Crafting and you become an expert in your inventor class DC.
